formattedAddress: 305 E 33rd St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 305 E 33rd St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
As a retired RN of 46 years I was very concerned about my son who saw you today
He felt you were a true professional and had great confidence in your knowledge and expertise
Thank you for taking such great care and properly diagnosing him
For months he walked around thinking he had Crohn’s disease
Again, thank you for taking great care

originalText.text: The best Gastroenterologist, he is making sure to answer all your questions,

text.text: The best Gastroenterologist, he is making sure to answer all your questions,

originalText.text: Dr Hudesman has been a wonderful gastroenterologist for me. He’s very caring, and unlike many busy physicians, he has been responsive and available whenever I have a question. I’ve also seen his colleague Dr Chang a few times who has been just as wonderful as Dr Hudesman. They’re a great team of providers.

text.text: Dr Hudesman has been a wonderful gastroenterologist for me. He’s very caring, and unlike many busy physicians, he has been responsive and available whenever I have a question. I’ve also seen his colleague Dr Chang a few times who has been just as wonderful as Dr Hudesman. They’re a great team of providers.

originalText.text: Dr. Hudesman has put my IBD into a strong remission. He is extremely kind, gentle and patient when I asked millions of questions. He always welcomes me with a smile and positive energy. The staff is also super friendly and sensitive which is exactly what patients need. There are hardly any wait times. If I come in early they usually even take me in early. Great service and care. Thank you.

text.text: Dr. Hudesman has put my IBD into a strong remission. He is extremely kind, gentle and patient when I asked millions of questions. He always welcomes me with a smile and positive energy. The staff is also super friendly and sensitive which is exactly what patients need. There are hardly any wait times. If I come in early they usually even take me in early. Great service and care. Thank you.

originalText.text: I’ve been a patient of Dr. Hudesman for over 10 years, when he was at Beth Israel and through his transition to NYU, he’s always given me the best care I could hope for. He listened to my concerns at 25 and with the same intent at 35 without ever being dismissive. He put me into remission with my Crohn’s and I completely trust him and his team. I will go to him for as long as I am within traveling range.
